name: Separation (Moolordking)
description: A 2player fit-in-with-the-NPCs game in a sleek 2D form. all you need is a mouse and keyboard or a mouse and an x-box controller. With a mouse and keyboard the seeker uses the mouse to try and spot the escapist, whilst having but 5 shots. the escapist is controlled by either the controller's X B and Y buttons or the keyboards UP LEFT and RIGHT arrow keys and tries to fit in with the NPCs and touch each of the 2-4 spikies on the level. if the seeker finds the escapist and shoots him, the victory goes to the seeker. if the escapist touches all the spikies or the seeker uses up all 5 shots then the escapist wins.
